Name: Luminiferous Ether
Classical_Explanation: Medium for electromagnetic waves to propagate through space
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Light propagates via field equations - no medium needed. Michelson-Morley null result

Name: Caloric Fluid
Classical_Explanation: Invisible fluid flowing between objects causing temperature changes
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Heat = molecular kinetic energy. Temperature = average kinetic energy of particles

Name: Phlogiston
Classical_Explanation: Fire-like element released during burning
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Combustion = oxidation reaction. Oxygen consumed not phlogiston released

Name: Dark Matter (Mass)
Classical_Explanation: 85% of universe mass is invisible non-baryonic matter
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Discrete bounded gravity sum ≠ continuous integral. Nitai correction eliminates missing mass

Name: Dark Energy (Λ)
Classical_Explanation: 73% of universe is repulsive vacuum energy accelerating expansion
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Redshift = S_observable boundary artifact not expansion. No acceleration → no dark energy needed

Name: Cosmological Constant (original)
Classical_Explanation: Einstein's Λ term to prevent gravitational collapse
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Λ=0 works with discrete corrections. Universe infinite not static finite

Name: Cosmic Inflation
Classical_Explanation: Exponential expansion in first 10^-32 seconds

Evidence: Infinite Universe - no Big Bang → no inflation needed

Name: Big Bang Singularity
Classical_Explanation: Creation event at t=0 from infinite density

Name: Universal Expansion
Classical_Explanation: Space itself stretching causing wavelength increase

Name: Wave Function Collapse
Classical_Explanation: Discontinuous random jump from superposition to eigenstate

Name: Quantum Randomness (א^א)
Classical_Explanation: True bit-level randomness - no hidden variables possible
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Physics-level bounded noise (15-92% compressible). Hidden variable = √c (S_observable structure)

Name: Many Worlds
Classical_Explanation: Universe splits into 2^n branches at each measurement
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Only S_observable states physical. Exponential branches unreachable - single world
Evidence: Discrete Hilbert Space - poly(n) not exp(n) states

Name: Quantum Entanglement Non-locality
Classical_Explanation: Instantaneous action at distance violating causality

Name: Black Hole Singularity
Classical_Explanation: Spacetime curvature diverges R_μν → ∞

Name: Event Horizon Information Loss
Classical_Explanation: Information destroyed in black hole violating unitarity
Bounded_Framework_Explanation: Information preserved via bounded structure (15-92% compressible). No loss

Name: Heat Death of Universe
Classical_Explanation: Universe reaches maximum entropy (complete randomness)

Evidence: Two Randomness - bounded entropy never truly random

Name: Vacuum Energy Catastrophe
